alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Monroe; Pike; Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:56PM CDT until March 31 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... East central Boone County in central Missouri... Audrain County in central Missouri... North central Callaway County in central Missouri... Southeastern Monroe County in northeastern Missouri... West central Pike County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 356 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Mexico, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mexico around 405 PM CDT. Laddonia around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Farber, Vandalia, Center and Curryville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and northeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central and northeastern Missouri.

area.areaDesc: Audrain; Boone; Callaway; Monroe; Pike; Ralls
